@appShortName.description: The short-version name of the extension name

@appDesc.message: A floating scientific calculator anywhere you need it

@fdbkCareToShare.message: Glad you like it! Can you help us share the ❤️?

@reportAnIssue.description: Button text for reporting an issue

@optionBlockedSitesDesc.message: Extension will not run on these sites. Enter one site per line.

@optionDefaultActionDesc.message: Open the calculator inside a page or a sidepanel or standalone window.

@optionDefaultWidthDesc.message: The width of the calculator when it launches.

@optionDefaultHeightDesc.message: The height of the calculator when it launches.

@optionEnableFractionsDesc.message: Where possible, renders the result as a fraction instead of decimal.

@optionAnswerPrecisionDesc.message: The number of decimal places that answers are round up to.

@optionDefaultToBasicDesc.message: Launch calculator in basic mode (no trignometric functions).

@optionEnableMinimizeDesc.message: Displays a control (in the header) for minimizing the calculator

@optionEnableDarkModeDesc.message: Give the interface a dark look.
